messages.title: Most important election in a generation
messages.content: As the general election, you will make a choice about the future of our country. It is a choice between the Tories' failed plan, and a better plan with Labour.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We all rely on the NHS to be there when we need it. Labour will recruit 8,000 more doctors and 20,000 more nurses.
I would oppose Tory cuts to our Police. Labour would guarantee neighbourhood policing in every area.
Household bills have been increasing for many years. Labour will help you by freezing gas and electricity prices until 2017.
I believe that people should receive a decent day's pay for a decent day's work. Labour will increase the minimum wage to £8 per hour by 2019.

issues.health: We all rely on the NHS to be there when we need it. Labour will recruit 8,000 more doctors and 20,000 more nurses.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have a strong track record of working with communities. I have been an elected Councillor since 2006 and a former Mayor of Lambeth, with a special interest in using technology to improve public services and involve residents in decisions that affect them.

endorsements.endorsement: Supports Christopher as a first rate candidate to represent Arundel & South Downs. Praises his work and enthusiasm, and states that Labour needs to stand up for the NHS.
Supports Christopher because Labour is the only party that will stand up for the NHS, referencing the 1930s and the choice between paying to see a doctor or paying the rent.

images.caption: Christopher Wellbelove engaging with a community member.
